basic_info.name: Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT), Guntur FAQs

faqs.question: Is there a management quota in Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT)?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, there is a management quota for admissions in Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT) as admissions are also offered to non-entrance candidates if required.

faqs.question: Does theKallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT) provide financial assistance to the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT) provides various scholarships to meritorious students. Also, scholarships can be availed through different schemes by the government.

faqs.question: Is engineering at KHIT Guntur worth it?
faqs.answer: Ans.KHIT, Guntur provides well-paid placements, good skills, and worth-remembering college life. Pursuing an engineering course at KHIT, Guntur is good if you don’t have the option to study in any metro city college or do not have a good enough ranking to get into a government college.

faqs.question: How to avail of the hostel facility of KHIT, Guntur?
faqs.answer: Ans.Students can avail of KHIT, Guntur hostel facility during the counselling process or at the time of admission. The hostel is quite good which has the facility of sanitation and gyms. Nutritious and good food is provided in the mess.

faqs.question: Does KHIT, Guntur organize sports activities for the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, KHIT, Guntur pays special attention to the fitness of the students pursuing variant courses at the campus for which the institution conducts various sports activities.

Section.name: About KHIT
Section.description:
Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (KHIT), established in 2010, is a private institution located in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh. The college is approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTUK), Kakinada.
KHIT offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in technical and management streams such as B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, and diploma courses. Admissions are offered on the basis of national entrance exams like JEE, GATE, CAT, and state-level entrance exams like EAMCET, POLYCET, and AP-ICET.
Various industry giants like TCS, Wipro, Cognizant, Justdial, Syntel Software, Media Mint, GBOX, etc. are the major recruiters of the institution. The college has been graded ‘A’ with a CGPA of 3.2.
KHIT, Guntur offers various UG, PG, and Diploma courses such as B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA. Tabulated below are the details of the courses offered – eligibility, duration, and specialization:

Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Techn.Details:
Duration: 4 years
			Eligibility: 10+2 level examination or equivalent from any other recognized Board/University with a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST)
			Specializations: Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering

Duration: 2 years
			Eligibility: Must have passed B. Tech in the relevant field recognized by the Central or State Government with 50% aggregate marks.
			Specializations: Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Thermal Engineering, VLSI Design & Embedded System

Duration: 3 years
			Eligibility: 10+2 level examination or equivalent from any other recognized Board/University with a minimum of 45% marks (40% for SC/ST)
			Specializations: Civil Engineering (Structural Engineering), Mechanical Engineering (Thermal Engineering), Electronics & Communication Engineering (VLSI & Embedded Systems), Computer Science and Engineering

Duration: 2 years
			Eligibility: Graduate in any discipline with a score of 50% marks in aggregate.
			Specializations: Finance, Marketing, Human Resource Management
